entity.name: Science & Design, Inc.
entity.description: Science & Design, Inc. is a nonprofit building free and open-source tools to protect digital freedoms and privacy. We maintain Hush Line, a secure whistleblowing platform that connects sources to verified journalists, educators, and organizations.

projects.name: Hush Line
projects.description: Hush Line is a secure, anonymous whistleblowing platform. It enables sources to safely submit information to verified recipients. It supports a directory of trusted users and a verification system to prevent impersonation.

channels.description: Support Science & Design via our Open Collective page.

plans.name: Free
plans.description: Provides a secure, anonymous tip line with essential features.

plans.name: Super User
plans.description: Includes additional features like aliases and custom subjects.

plans.name: Single-Tenant Deployment
plans.description: Custom deployment of a fully isolated, self-managed Hush Line instance. This is a contractual agreement and not part of our SaaS product tiers.

history.description: Grant from Data Empowerment Fund, and feature development funding from Psst.org.
